title: Behind The Idea # 68: Trupanion's Tricky Spot
description: Trupanion sparks bulls' and bears' passions even as it takes care of our cats and dogs. We bring on The CrickAnt, a Seeking Alpha author who focuses on insurance companies, to break down Trupanion's positioning and the particularities of the insurance industry. He highlights the biggest challenge the company faces - the need to gain market share while also increasing its bottom line.
itunes:title: Trupanion's Tricky Spot
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: Trupanion appears stuck between a need to grow and a thin profit margin
